ModMetaData.name: RimSaves
ModMetaData.author: aRandomKiwi
ModMetaData.description:
Save menu improvements. Organize your saves into folders, no more autosave overwriting between colonies in different folders, saves previews, search, quicksaves, saves sorting, rename/duplicate saves, mass saves removing...
Version NX <color=#FFD800>rev25</color> for Rimworld.
